vista.report

Class MonthlyReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • vista.report.MonthlyReport

  • public class MonthlyReport
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates formatted text in an array of strings each element of which represents one line of the report
    Author:
    Nicky Sandhu: "$Id: MonthlyReport.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:17 redwood Exp $" Last change: AM 14 Jun 2000 5:40 pm

    • Constructor Detail

      • MonthlyReport

        public MonthlyReport(vista.set.RegularTimeSeries ds,
                     vista.set.Pathname pathname,
                     java.lang.String file)
        creates a monthly report for given data for water year format for years in ascending order
        Parameters:
        ds - the data set containing the values
        pathname - the pathname for the data set
        file - the dss file containing the data

      • MonthlyReport

        public MonthlyReport(vista.set.RegularTimeSeries ds,
                     vista.set.Pathname pathname,
                     java.lang.String file,
                     boolean isWaterYear,
                     int[] yearArray)
        creates a monthly report for given data
        Parameters:
        ds - the data set containing the values
        pathname - the pathname for the data set
        file - the dss file containing the data
        _isWaterYear - true if water year format is desired
        yearArray - An array of integers containing the order in which the years have to be plotted. Each integer is the year value such as 1972.

    • Method Detail

      • getStyledDocument

        public javax.swing.text.StyledDocument getStyledDocument()
        This method generates a document for the time series in the constructor. The document has a few styles to highlight headings in bold, min and max in different colors, etcetra. As a first shot all the customization is done for the user but these would be options for the user to set as the design becomes more sophisticated.

      • getStyledDocument

        public javax.swing.text.StyledDocument getStyledDocument(int type)

        public javax.swing.text.StyledDocument appendTo(javax.swing.text.StyledDocument doc,
                                                int type)
        This method generates a document for the time series in the constructor. The document has a few styles to highlight headings in bold, min and max in different colors, etcetra. As a first shot all the customization is done for the user but these would be options for the user to set as the design becomes more sophisticated.
